sentences.pinyin: Tā shōu huí tā de huà.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在听到他的道歉后，她决定收回她之前对他的批评。
sentences.traditionalText: 在聽到他的道歉後，她決定收回她之前對他的批評。
sentences.pinyin: Zài tīng dào tā de dàoqiàn hòu, tā juédìng shōu huí tā zhīqián duì tā de pīpíng.
sentences.translation: Upon hearing his apology, she decided to take back her previous criticism of him.

sentences.pinyin: qǐng bǎ nǐ de huà shōu huí.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在我意识到自己犯了一个大错误后，我立即收回了我的话。
sentences.traditionalText: 在我意識到自己犯了一個大錯誤後，我立即收回了我的話。
sentences.pinyin: zài wǒ yìshí dào zìjǐ fàn le yīgè dà cuòwù hòu, wǒ lìjí shōu huí le wǒ de huà.
sentences.translation: After I realized that I made a big mistake, I immediately took back my words.

sentences.pinyin: Tā juédìng shōuhuí tā de huà.
sentences.translation: He decided to withdraw his words.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在考虑所有可能的后果后，他决定收回他先前的立场。
sentences.traditionalText: 在考慮所有可能的後果後，他決定收回他先前的立場。
sentences.pinyin: Zài kǎolǜ suǒyǒu kěnéng de hòuguǒ hòu, tā juédìng shōuhuí tā xiānqián de lìchǎng.
sentences.translation: After considering all possible consequences, he decided to revoke his previous position.
